lead_paragraph: The Big 12 Conference will not split into divisions for football and instead will match its first- and second-place teams when its championship game returns next season.

headline.print_headline: Big 12 Will Take Top 2 Teams for Title Game, No Divisions
headline.main: Big 12 Will Take Top 2 Teams for Title Game, No Divisions

snippet: The Big 12 Conference will not split into divisions for football and instead will match its first- and second-place teams when its championship game returns next season....
